snippet.title: Spyragon: 2 Full-Hexagons are Better than One
snippet.description:
Spyragon is available to play on the iOS App Store: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/spyragon/id1584715775

In Spyragon, the Full-Hexagon is the most impressive and impactful move on the board.  Just creating 1 will make the entire board explode.  But why stop at 1 if it's possible to create 2 with the same move!

Directions available at: https://spyraverse.com

Also follow us on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @spyraverse

#Spyragon #Spyraverse #gaming #mobilegames #mobilegaming #iosgames #ios #hypercasual #newgames
